ComicInfo.Title: Inherit the Earth Part Two: As Below, So Above; Talez of ZvR; The Orphan Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Inherit the Earth!,” part 2! Even on a dead, nuked Earth, the zombies remain. But how? And both the dead and some of the bots seem to have gained sentience? But why? Also: new humans join the fight? But who? Some answers and more questions are presented here! And in “The Orphan,” part 2, a new friendship is threatened by, of course, hordes of zombies and one very disturbed robot.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ashley Wood | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | James Stokoe | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:27. [CVDB480710]
ComicInfo.Writer: Ashley Wood, Chris Ryall, Steve Niles
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Characters: Ann Tran, Cesar Ortiz, Finola Moorpark, Jenae Jefferson, Jukka Elfson, Rosemary, Zeb Nova
